data.title: Ohio Northern University
data.text:
Summer: Polar Bear Style

Researching a potential treatment for ovarian cancer. Exploring ways to make space travel easier on the human body. Assisting a Fortune 500 company with internal communications. Running youth soccer camps for a professional soccer team. These are just a few of the amazing internship and research experiences undertaken by ONU students this summer.

At ONU, we give care and attention to helping our students land career-defining experiences outside of ONU. Our faculty and alumni network are committed to building our students’ resumes and aiding them in finding True North.

Explore summer intern stories

#1 in Ohio, #2 in the Midwest

New Wall Street Journal and U.S. News & World Report rankings list Ohio Northern University as a top college for providing an exceptional and affordable education. ONU is ranked No. 2 in U.S. News & World Report’s Best Regional Colleges Midwest list for 2024, making it No. 1 in Ohio, and places highly in other key categories, including 3rd (first in Ohio) in regional Best Value Schools. The WSJ/College Pulse 2024 Best Colleges in the U.S. ranks ONU No. 33 in the nation and No. 1 in Ohio for “salary impact.”
